name: sftp-to-papertrail
description: A Node module that retrieves one or more log files via SFTP, and logs new entries to Papertrail. Deploys to AWS Lambda and uses S3 for maintaining state.
author: Tim Malone <tdmalone@gmail.com>

scripts.docker-tests: docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION -e STP_SFTP_HOST -e STP_SFTP_PORT -e STP_SFTP_USERNAME -e STP_SFTP_PASSWORD -e STP_SFTP_PATH -e STP_S3_BUCKET -e STP_S3_REGION -e STP_SFTP_HOST -e STP_PAPERTRAIL_HOST -e STP_PAPERTRAIL_PORT --rm -v $PWD:/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler {}
